Key Match Events: Tyler O’Neill hit a walk-off three-run home run in the 10th inning to secure a 5-3 win over the Baltimore Orioles
Post-Match Reflections: Boston Red Sox manager Alex Cora emphasized the importance of continuing their winning streak for postseason hopes
Tyler O’Neill's performance was crucial in keeping the team afloat in the wild-card race
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox are four games back with 16 games remaining in the American League wild-card race
Brennan Bernardino was placed on the injured list with left elbow inflammation
Liam Hendriks is expected to return soon but faced setbacks with elbow soreness
James Paxton announced his retirement after the 2024 season
